render_info.source_dynamic: SELECT ac.Id as Id, ac.Name as Name, FORMAT(ac.CreatedDTG, 'dd/MM/yyyy') as CreatedDTG, e.Username as Creator, FORMAT(ac.UpdateDTG, 'dd/MM/yyyy') as UpdateDTG, CASE ac.isDeleted WHEN 0 THEN N'Còn hiệu lực' ELSE N'Đã xóa' END AS Status FROM [dbo].[AwardingCatalog] ac join [dbo].[adm_Employee] e on ac.CreateUserId = e.EmployeeID
